summary: Adds the god-like spell from Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
For those of you who have played Oblivion, this mod adds the god-like spell from the game.

For those of you who have not:
1. What is wrong with you? It's $25 for the super Game of the Year edition that gives you all the dlc plus two houses from the start.
2. This is a god spell that all one needs to do is point in the general direction of your enemies (or Braith) and cause death.

The spell can be found on the floor of Dragonsreach as you walk in and does not require much magjica to use.

No, you do not need to ask permission from me, use it as you please.

And before you ask, no, you do not need any dlc for this mod to work, keep licking that vanilla ice cream.

Workshop link for the lazy: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=270577696
author: 5corpio
